Pre-Game Insights: Experts favored the 76ers to win based on their recent performance.
The matchup has a point total of 213.5.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 76ers are 13-19-0 against the spread this season.
Against the spread, the Nets are 17-15-2 this year.
Games involving the 76ers have hit the over 16 times out of 34 chances this season.
Nets games this year have gone over the point total 50% of the time (17 out of 34 games with a set point total).
Philadelphia has covered the spread in a lower percentage of its home games than away games.
The 76ers have exceeded the over/under less consistently at home, hitting the over in six of 14 home matchups (42.9%).
In away games, they have hit the over in 10 of 18 games (55.6%).
Brooklyn has been better against the spread away (13-6-1) than at home (4-9-1) this year.
Both at home (seven of 14) and on the road (10 of 20), the Nets' games have finished over (in terms of the over/under) 50% of the time.
